PropertyList.name: cruise
PropertyList.description:
The aircraft will be in "crusing" state, no flaps, engines running. First select "Location" tab with "Runway" and "On final approach", then select this state. Or provide --lat, --lon, --altitude, --heading and --vc in settings.
Additional parameters required Use Runway, On final approach in QT-launcher GUI Or supply --lon=degrees Starting longitude (west = -) --lat=degrees Starting latitude (south = -) --altitude=value Starting altitude (in feet unless --units-meters specified) --heading=degrees Specify heading (yaw) angle (Psi) --vc=knots Specify initial airspeed
